arts.ttl: Spain's media gives Arsenal star Mikel Merino a new nickname after what he did as a substitute last night
Nations League: Merino saves Spain in Netherlands, Germany roar back at Italy
arts.sum: Arsenalâ€™s makeshift striker on target again in 2-2 draw Goretzka gives Germans the edge in quarter-final Spain snatched a stoppage-time equaliser against the 10 men of the Netherlands to secure a 2-2 draw on Thursday that kept up a two-year unbeaten streak and gave the holders the advantage in their Nations League quarter-final tie. Substitute Mikel Merino, a makeshift striker at club level for Arsenal, proved his ability in front of goal for his country too with a close-range finish three minutes into added time. arts.ttl: Merino gives Spain late draw vs. 10-man Dutch
arts.sum: Spain snatched a stoppage-time equaliser against 10-man Netherlands to secure a 2-2 draw on Thursday that kept up a two-year unbeaten streak and gave the holders the advantage in their UEFA Nations League quarterfinal tie.

arts.ttl: Netherlands Player Ratings in draw against Spain
arts.sum: Netherlands drew the opening leg of their Nations League quarter-final with Spain 2-2 in Rotterdam. Below is the player ratings for the Oranje stars. Bart Verbruggen 6.5/10: Not a bad performance and he was calm during the game and made some decent saves. However, the equaliser he could have done better. arts.ttl: Mikel Merino rescues Spain as Croatia stun France in Nations League quarter-finals
arts.sum: Germany came back to beat Italy while Denmark shocked Portugal in the other two ties

arts.ttl: Netherlands 2-2 Spain: Highlights, man of the match, stats as La Roja fight back to leave quarter-final delicately poised
arts.sum: Mikel Merino comes up with a last-gasp leveller as Spain fight back to draw 2-2 with 10-man Netherlands in the first leg of their UEFA Nations League quarter-final.

arts.ttl: Nations League: 10-man Netherlands draw with Spain
arts.sum: The Netherlands conceded a late equaliser as the first leg of their Nations League quarter-final finished 2-2. Ronald Koeman decided to start with Justin Kluivert as the ten, Jeremie Frimpong on the wing and Jorrel Hato as left-back for the clash with Spain. arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso Named the 'Underrated' Englishman Who Could've Played for Spain in 2010
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso once named the 'underrated' England player he believed was good enough to play for Spain.
